level.heading: Reports to the Board.
level.text: The Board shall require reports from the Committee annually and at such other times as it believes may be necessary and appropriate. The reports shall include:
Information concerning the number of cases accepted, denied, and terminated, with compliance or noncompliance; and
A cost analysis of the Program.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 16-191 validated a previously made technical correction.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-297
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-297, see notes following ยง 3-1251.01.
